title: anbu mAlai
sahitya:
anbu mAlai shUTTuginrEn en Ashai malarAl pUjai sheidE


anupallavi

  shem-pork-kAlai sErttuk-kOTTut-trikaraNa shuddhiyODu
nambum aDiyAr kUTTattuDanE namah shivAya Om haravenrE


caraNam    antaranga vishvAsamumAtmAnanda sukha vAsamum 
cintai inikkum gAna rasamum serinden uLLam silirkka silirkka
